fields.description: In 4.1.x we implemented a quick fix for EC2 describe volume performance in EUCA-10692. We need to implement a correct fix for the issue in 4.2. We should use entities for persistence of volume attachments and could also investigate removing the distinction between "persistent" (boot time) and "transient" volumes.

comments.body:
To verify we should regression test volume attachment functionality, including those specified on instance launch. 

Upgrade testing is required due to schema changes. Before upgrade ensure that there are instances with attached volumes specified on instance launch as well as instances with volumes attached while running. After upgrade verify that volume attachments for the instances are as expected.

Ideally we would also do some testing to ensure there is no regression of the 4.1.1 EUCA-10692 fix.

Fix verified.

This was tested by creating volumes during instance launch and attaching after instance was already running.
